stands_and_booths_text: One of the advantages of hosting an online/virtual events is that there is no "floor space" restrictions. We allow anyone to invite as many exhibitors as they can. The more the merrier!
invite_stand_owner_title: Invite stand owners to participate in your event!
invite_stand_owner_text: With a few simple clicks, the event organiser can easily invite a stand/booth to the event. The Exhibitor will receive an invitation in their email, that they can accept or reject.
invite_stand_owner_tab3: Have them represent their brand on your event!
schedule_meetings_chat_title: Let attendees schedule meetings and start a chat with stand's/booth's staff.
schedule_meetings_chat_text: One of the ideas behind attending the event is networking. We tried to create the simplest and the most effective solutions to do so. Here are some them.
schedule_meetings_chat_tab2: Let attendees schedule meetings and chat to the exhibitors!
schedule_meetings_chat_tab3: Let attendees and exhibitors communicate via video!
more_information_about_stand_title: Check out some more information about stand's functionality.
customise_your_stand_text: Let the stand owner be in control of the stand from A to Z. Invite staff, chat and more
tag_your_booth_text: Categorise the stand that it can be filtered for a specific category
filter_stands_text: Let the stand be easily searched for by the attendees by filters
